participant_1.background:
I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
my shyness made me panick and i didn t show up.
I dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.
I live in the suburbs so that I can be close to my family and friends, but I also enjoy visiting the city to see my best friend and play cello with her.
I'd brag about my ability to stay focused and motivated, even when things get tough.

i look down on people who did not.

content.text: Hey! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a pitbull and an old english bulldog
Oh nice! I have a golden retriever.
I have been hiking up volcanoes with my dog. Do you like to hike?
I do! I actually love hiking.
I'm kind of a klutz, but I'm proud of my comic book collection. What do you like to do in your spare time?
I play cello and I work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
Cello? That's so cool! I work from home too. I'm a web developer.
Nice! I work for a company that makes video games.
Oh that sounds like fun! I've never been to the city.
Oh, I'm sure you'd like it! There's lots to see and do.
